Bounty Chip
Tower guardian places a bounty on nearby non-common enemies causing them to grant more coins on death.
Bounty amount is based on all currently active coin multipliers on target enemies when they are killed, multiplied by Bounty's Multiplier stat; Golden Bot, Death Wave, Golden Tower, Black Hole, Spotlight, etc will all increase the amount of coins gained.
